roleset.name: not worthy of trust
roleset.note: UNTRUSTWORTHY-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-4,5. (from untrustworthy.01-j)

role.descr: what is not upheld/preserved by arg1

example.name: args 1, 2
example.text: Breaching this covenant not only is intrinsic sin, but means such a person is untrustworthy to the original commitment made in the marriage.
example.arg: to the original commitment made in the marriage

example.name: args1, 2
example.text: Big Business is untrustworthy with our health.
